ui.yaml:
apiVersion: v1
items:
  - apiVersion: v1
    kind: Service
    metadata:
      name: example-ui
    spec:
      ports:
        - port: 80
          targetPort: 80
      selector:
        app: example-ui
      type: LoadBalancer
  - apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
    kind: Deployment
    metadata:
      name: example-ui
    spec:
      replicas: 1
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:
            app: example-ui
        spec:
          containers:
            - image: >-
                gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend:v4gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend:v4
              name: example-ui
              ports:
                - containerPort: 80
kind: List
